mcq.statement: Which sentence uses correct grammar to describe a book? This book is about art and its history is really fascinates, The book gives inspiration anyone who loves painting, This is a must-read book to artists and painters alike, The book provides inspiration for those who love painting

options.a: This book is about art and its history is really fascinates
options.b: The book gives inspiration anyone who loves painting
options.c: The book provides inspiration for those who love painting
